library(tidyverse)

#Diamonds cuts and colors

What color is most likely to earn an __ideal__ cut? The color *G*! 

Other colors could include:

* J
* I
* H
* F
* E
* D


```{r echo=FALSE}
ggplot(diamonds,aes(x=cut, y=color)) +
  geom_bin2d() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = 'Ideal cut diamonds are most likely to be color G') +
  xlab('cut') +
  ylab('color') +
    annotate('text', x = 5, y = 4, label = 'G', size=9, color = 'red')
```
